title: Executive Threat Briefing
description: A security awareness manager must prepare and deliver a threat briefing to the company's executive leadership team.

tasks.description: Gather data on recent security incidents and the current threat landscape relevant to the company's industry.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager collects relevant and timely threat intelligence.

tasks.description: Create a concise, non-technical presentation that summarizes the key risks and highlights the importance of executive support for security initiatives.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager creates a presentation tailored to a non-technical, executive audience.

tasks.description: Deliver the briefing to the executive team and answer their questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully communicates the key security risks and gains executive buy-in.
